[
    If {
        condition: Parenthesized {
            left_parenthesis: Span(
                3,
                4,
            ),
            inner: Variable(
                SimpleVariable(
                    SimpleVariable {
                        span: Span(
                            3,
                            5,
                        ),
                        name: "foo",
                    },
                ),
            ),
            right_parenthesis: Span(
                3,
                9,
            ),
        },
        then: [],
        else_ifs: [],
        else: Some(
            [
                If {
                    condition: Parenthesized {
                        left_parenthesis: Span(
                            5,
                            11,
                        ),
                        inner: Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span(
                                        5,
                                        12,
                                    ),
                                    name: "bar",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                        right_parenthesis: Span(
                            5,
                            16,
                        ),
                    },
                    then: [],
                    else_ifs: [],
                    else: None,
                },
            ],
        ),
    },
]
